# Introduction

Code in support of "Aerial Imagery and Point Cloud Data for Slash Pile Quantification"

## Objective

The objective of this study is to demonstrate the use of aerial point cloud data (SfM) and both RGB and hyperspectral imagery to identify and quanity slash piles.
